name: Ireland
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. Always verify with Irish counsel and CBI guidance for the specific structure and distribution plan.
marketing_notes: Marketing and disclosure requirements depend on investor type and product classification.
Counsel review required for any public claims.
licensing_notes: ManCo/AIFM and delegation rules vary by structure and service provider roles.
tokenization_notes: Tokenization requires separate offering/transfer and custody analysis.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto-linked features may require enhanced risk and operational controls.
